data.description:
*** Currently in Public Alpha ***
*** Provide feedback & connect with us at: www.x82hub.com/issues ***

You'll soon be creating interactive stories, games and experiences in VR and mixed reality to share with your friends.

Removing barriers to unlock your creativity:
* Use AI to generate images, text and interactive characters.
* Import 3d models from Sketchfab.
* Import your own photos, drawings and text.
* Record your voice or generate voices from text.
* Hundreds of scalable icons built in.

Claim your profile and metaverse addresses on our X82 metaverse and upload your content to share with friends.

Co-location multiplayer supported for mixed reality projects.
VR multiplayer coming soon.

Ideal for interactive stories, escape room games, training scenarios, interactive mind maps, presentations and more.

changelog.change_log: Fixed issue with voice to text for narration. Auto narration has been removed as this caused issues when multiple text windows were open. Voice chat has been added ready for full VR multiplayer. Avatars are coming next.

Added help assistant to edit mode to provide tips and tutorials.
Added more contextual tips.
Added sample gallery project.
Improved start up scene. Allow portals to teleport to points of interest. Various fixes.

Teleport, walk and fly are all now accessed on the locomotion control. (Hand menu / Move)
You can configure which locomotion modes are allowed for a location state.
New script command to launch / hide the locomotion control.
Some improvements to "point of interest" settings and scripts.
Added  new demo project, Only Despair, a non-linear interactive story.
Added AI Worlds experience to show off art and narrative generated with AI that can be experienced via our X82 metaverse.
AI Santa  (see features experiences from the start location) + general bug fixes
Some fixes to multiplayer and MR demos to ensure your are asked to set up the correct scene objects.
